mapper.select: SELECT n.*, m.nickname, m.account_holder, m.id AS "mId" FROM note n LEFT JOIN member m ON m.seq = n.receiver WHERE n.type = 1 AND n.send_type = 1 AND n.sender = #{sender} ORDER BY n.send_time DESC

SELECT n.*, m.nickname, m.account_holder, m.id AS "mId" FROM note n LEFT JOIN member m ON m.seq = n.receiver WHERE n.type = 1 AND n.send_type = 0 AND n.receiver = #{receiver} ORDER BY n.send_time DESC
SELECT * FROM note n WHERE n.classification = #{note.classification} AND n.type = #{note.type} ORDER BY n.send_time
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM note n WHERE n.receiver = #{seq} AND n.read_status = 0
